dcterms:description: An offline dataset provided for the IEEE Big Data 2021 Cup challenge, containing over 250,000 playing sessions, 381 items, and approximately 40,000 users. The dataset includes user portraits, clicking history, item features, and purchase information.
dcterms:title: IEEE Big Data 2021 Cup Dataset
